name: Buffalo: Remastered
description:
Buffalo is an easy-to-play game where you control a buffalo that just wants to eat prairie greens while avoiding arrows shot by hunters.

How to play: Touch the screen anywhere to have the buffalo move towards that location.

Buffalo is also available on Google Play store with in-game advertisements.  If you donate $1.00 in support here on itch.io, you have access to an APK (Android Package Kit) that allows you to play the game without ads on your Android device.

  • Programming/Art: Ben Nguyen
  • Sound FX: kingsonone, therealmattix
  • Music: "Summer" by bensound
  • Quality Control: Alyssa Welch
  • Special thanks to Caleb Potts for providing the inspiration for this game.
